entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.6.3
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Fix OPDS cover images returning 401 on public domain (#267) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for the Release (#268) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.6.4

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.7.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Implement configurable sorting for sidebar libraries and shelves (#279) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add “Unassigned” shelf view for books not in any shelf (#277) by @adityachandelgit

🛠️ Refactoring

  • Increase column lengths across multiple tables for flexibility (#280) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#281) by @adityachandelgit
